articles.title: From chatbots to intelligent toys: How AI is booming in China - BBC.com
articles.description: China plans to invest more than a trillion dollars as it races against the US to rule advanced tech.
articles.content:
Laura Bicker
China is embracing artificial intelligence, from educational tools to humanoid robots in factories

articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Gmail gains an ‘Add to calendar’ button, powered by Gemini - TechCrunch
articles.description: A nifty new Gmail capability powered by Google's Gemini AI has arrived for Google Workspace customers.
articles.content:
A nifty new Gmail capability powered by Google’s Gemini AI has arrived for Google Workspace customers. Starting Monday, users can add events to a Google Calendar directly from an email.
